website_summaries.verdict: Easily fit most airline carry-on restrictions. Good for a single person who doesn't travel often.
pros: Convenient self-locking handle system for easy use
These two pieces are all that light travelers need, and the price is affordable
Expandable option with more packing capacity
cons: The larger bag is prone to wobbles and tips when completely full

website_summaries.verdict: This carry-on with matching tote is a good value on a soft-sided luggage option.
pros: Durable enough to hold up if checked
cons: Doesn't have the 360-degree wheels that other models offer

website_summaries.verdict: Attractive and durable 2-piece luggage set with plenty of interior space and pockets for traveling convenience.
pros: Exterior made with high-grade, heavy-duty polyester, and zippered pockets on the outside of both pieces for convenient accessing of travel essentials
Retractable push-button self-locking handle system on upright, plus gripping handles on top, side, and bottom for easier maneuverability
Piggyback-strap for transporting upright and tote together
cons: The lighter-color material stains and can be difficult to clean
Set may not hold up to being checked, but serves carry-on purposes well

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Carry On Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this set to all my family and friends. I had won a blue set from an Amazon giveaway right at the time I was looking for luggage for our Christmas Vacation. It was perfect so I ordered 3 more sets, the yellow set, the purple set and the green set. The luggage is the correct carry on size and the smaller bag can fit under the set on the plane. They roll great and my kids were able to handle their own luggage. As you can tell from pictures, the smaller bag fits on top of the bigger bag perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Sievert

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction - didn't last the trip I used them on.
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace these on the trip that I purchased them for. I bought them well in advance of my India trip and while I was there I noticed that the lining was already torn on the inside and the only items I had it in were garments, nothing with edges so I don't know why it ripped up. I had to change rooms so I packed them up again and when I got to the next room there was 'gunk' on the inside, I'm assuming adhesive, that I tracked back to under the lining and had to get some clothes cleaned. I threw the suitcase away and bought some from a store in Hyderabad.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Waters

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed about it!
customer_reviews.text: I have to complain! The handle quality is terrible ! I bought it for an overseas trip . Only use it only twice of carry on luggage for the round trip . The bag size is ok for choosing reasonable. But the handle is too fragile. What material does it made? It just broke after my flight landing home . That puts me a lot of trouble to exactly carry this suitcase!!! Is it only a once time useable case?!
customer_reviews.author: jennystern

customer_reviews.title: Great for international travel
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this suitcase in preparation for a 2.5 week trip to Europe. Our goal was to only have 1 carry-on suitcase each. It held up admirably- I was able to fit everything comfortably, the wheels held up fine when pulling it across cobblestones, and it met all the size requirements for a carry-on bag for every flight (both within America and internationally). The only real issue I had is that when it is full to capacity, the zippers on the outer pockets tend to separate when zipped. It wasn't a huge issue and I was able to get things re-zipped, but the zippers may not be super high quality.
customer_reviews.author: LosingKindMercantile

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I packed 4 pair of pants, 4 tanks, a maxi skirt, a maxi dress, a pair of sneakers and a pair of flip flops. All United airlines carry on size. In the smaller bag I packed under clothes, flat irons, toiletries, a crossbody purse and a book. The larger roller fit in the overhead without issue and the smaller 1 fit under the seat easily. United Airline checked bag price is $25 each way, I saved $20. The $30 bucks was well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Talldiva

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for The Occasional Traveler
customer_reviews.text: Hello If you travel occasionally and want a carry on that complies with airline regulations for the overhead bin in plane this will work for most. My spouse needed new carryon suitcase that would meet airline requirements. This fit the bill and she liked the color too.. For the price it is a good value. No it probably won't last over 50 trips but we only fly once a year so it meets our needs. If you travel dozens of times each year you will want something more sturdy but it worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Order was not complete
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my stepdaughter that lives in Denver. It was supposed to be a 2 piece set. A 21 inch and a 15 inch carry-on set. It turns out she only got the 21 inch piece, twice. I say twice because the first time it was delivered she only got 1 piece. I thought she said she got the smaller piece. She didnt. It was replaced. I thought she was getting the whole set replaced. But she only got the 21 inch piece, again. I've never had this kind of problem before. To say I'm disappointed is an under statement. The picture is what she recieved.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this suitcase for a recent trip to Europe and was very disappointed. I chose this one because it had more room inside than other 21"carry-on suitcases, and I did appreciate the roominess. However, the handle doesn't work well and pinches anyone trying to close it. This suitcase is not balanced...it tipped over often and couldn't stay straight on curbs and stairs. I think a 4-wheeled suitcase would be a much better choice. After just one trip, the fabric is frayed and it looks very used! I would not recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: JJHendricks

customer_reviews.title: Lousy telescoping handle for a great bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag size, material, pockets, mesh lining, wheels work perfectly. Stitching is sturdy and the bag looks very nice. The problem is the telscoping handle. It works with small, spring loaded metal pins that actuate with a button on the top of the handle. The metal pins stick in place either preventing the handle from extending or preventing it from collapsing. The fix: open the bag, run your hand down the metal down tubes, find the stuck pin, and manually depress it. I returned this bag and bought another brand w/a more robust handle. It's inexpensive because the handle is cheaply made. Would NOT buy this bag or brand again.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Hate This Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two piece luggage set for my daughter. She was traveling by train from CA to NY. The luggage is of standard size but the handle is so short it’s difficult to maneuver. She’s only 5’4” and she had to keep it almost upright to roll it cause the handle is fully extended in the pic. The second bag is so small it too is kind of useless. I bought a bigger duffle bag with the idea of strapping it to the luggage handle. The handle is so short that won’t work either. Glad this combo is so cheap because it will be less painful to give away at the end of her trip!
customer_reviews.author: IBAHAMMER

customer_reviews.title: Handle disconnected: stinks
customer_reviews.text: While it was a good idea overall as a set, it is cheaply constructed. The handle used for rolling it came completely out of the case. Luckily,this was at home and not in a busy Homeland Security line. I am going to return it, so at least it has a generous return date
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Handle stuck
customer_reviews.text: Last week we used the luggage on an airplane as carry on. The handle got stuck and wouldn't go down. When we got to our hotel I took it apart and finally managed to get the handle down, but the same thing happened on our return trip. I still haven't been able to get the handle to go down completely. It's worthless now. We won't be able to take it on a plane trip.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Secunda

customer_reviews.title: The Tardis of Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this set long enough to comment on durability, but I can comment on the functionality and style--both of which are terrific. Each of these cases holds more than I thought possible, while still maintaining a nice small profile. The interior pocket can handle a 15" laptop, the interior zipper and buckles hold garments in place, and the exterior pockets are big and easy to access with their long zippers. The spinners move easily and the handle is easy to use and stow with one hand. I purchased the green, which is easy to spot on the baggage carousel. As an average occasional traveler, I expect this set to long enough to deliver a good cost-per-use.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl J.Top Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Non-Swivel Wheels
customer_reviews.text: This is a very decent bag for the price. The one strike against this product is that the wheels only roll one direction. Once you get used to the bags that have the swivel casters it is hard to go back to the one way rollers that this bag features. In a crowded airport, you will have to lift this bag once you encounter a path that you cannot negotiate and you need to change direction with the bag. Ultimately if you have the cash, pony up 10 or 15 more bucks for the swivel casters.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I got the bright orange. It is astounding that almost all luggage on a plane is dark blue or black. Mine was so easy to spot. The larger of the two, which is the perfect carry on size, holds much more than you would expect.. The smaller is great for medication and makeup. I took a four day trip with changes of clothes for each day, extra blouses , night clothes, a towel and shoes and it all went in the carry on size case.
customer_reviews.author: C. Van Vlack

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Carry-on
customer_reviews.text: This bag is small, but if you are concerned about weight restrictions, this is your carry on! I recently went on an overseas trip and needed a good size carry-on, so I borrow one from a friend. Turns out, her carry-on was twice the weight of this one. Therefore, once I added items to it I went over the weight limit. I used this carry-on instead and had room to spare. The lighter weight makes all the difference, and it's durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Good color, good price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets of these in the yellow orange color for my daughter to move across the country. I was able to fit all of her clothes (roll them and you can fit so much more) along with notebooks, shoes, and some odds and ends. I liked that the color was different and bright, and they seemed to be of good quality. I didn’t want something too massive because the airlines charge an arm and a leg if you go over their bag size limits, so these were perfect for what we needed them for. The small little carryons were a great size for everyday use!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki B

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and better than a large backpack
customer_reviews.text: In the smaller bag, I put snacks, hand sanitizer, reader, sunglasses, water,...everything I need during the flight. In the larger bag I put supplements, medicines, jacket, and whatever didn't fit in my checked bad. I used to carry this in a back pack, and it's so much easier to pull the weight than carry it. They seem sturdy and did well on a round trip international flight we took. It fits well in the overhead.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe Gal

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for a trip home and it worked wonderfully. purchased the "one size" size and recieved both ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw some negative reviews about this suitcase. I bought it for a trip home and it worked wonderfully. purchased the "one size" size and recieved both bags. Unsure what the other size means or why it's so much more expensive. That's why I give it 4 stars, totally unclear what that means. I took a risk and got it, and totally worth the money. I fit easily 5 days worth of clothes a pair of tennis shoes, toiletries, and books in it without issue. Also comes with a cheapo travel lock. Main pocket has interlocking zippers which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for a while now and use it whenever I travel. I have had no rips or tears occur at all. Luggage is very good quality and I love the matching set. It fits perfectly as a carry-on. I use the smaller of the two bags for my toiletries and the larger for all my clothes and my laptop. The larger bag has straps inside that hold down everything so I can fit a ton of stuff in it. I tend to overpack and I don't like to pay extra for a checked bag so these are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L

customer_reviews.title: Used once- unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to supplement the family luggage stash when several of us needs carry-one. It does not maneuver easily- only 2 wheels on the back, telescoping handle is wobbly, and it tips over when upright. The zippers aren't smooth in operation even under no strain. The shoulder bag is a flimsy joke. Wish I'd bought a different case- hope this holds up even for a year
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, well made, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the smallest because I thought from the reviews it would be large enough. I think it's perfect for a small child. But that's on me for not paying better attention to the measurements and comparing it to the bag I already have. But the extra bag is a great size for you to fit all of your toiletries in. Including a hair dryer. I ordered the purple and it's true to color. The bag is extremely sturdy and well made. Well worth the $29! The wheels are very nice quality and will hold up for a long time. Love all the extra compartments. They're a must for intimates and such.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Falls over too easily, handle is not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: When the suitcase is packed and you go to stand it up, it falls over forwards, making it difficult when you have to set it in place to pull out your ticket etc. Also, the extending handle is very loose and the two wheels are very awkward when maneuvering around the airport. Zippers have held even when the suitcase is stuffed. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Olney

customer_reviews.title: Clean it before you use it!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so after about 3 months of owning this suitcase I have figured out that it had to have had some kind of bug in it. I am not going to go through the investigation and how I know it points to this suitcase. I will say the suitcase is fine, works well blah blah but it’s kind of overshadowed by the fact that ever since It has been sitting next to my bed I have been waking up with random bites all over me.
customer_reviews.author: christopher wilson

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke - NO Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use when traveling with us. Unfortunately after a couple of uses the extendable handle got stuck and now will not pull out from the case. The bag is covered by a 3 year warranty which is still in effect for this purchase. I wrote to the email address provided on the warranty tag almost three months ago and have received no reply. I am disappointed that the handle broke on my bag but am more disappointed that the manufacturer has not responded to me and apparently does not intend to honor their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, perfect for short trips.
customer_reviews.text: These bags worked perfect for my trip to Pittsburgh. As a plus size girl I was still able to pack for 5 days worth of winter weather outfits in these bags. I have used them many times since then and they have shown no real signs of wear and tear yet. Very happy with my purchase. The purple color is so vibrant and beautiful. Good quality bags.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Simmer

customer_reviews.title: 2 years, multiple airports and still look new.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these sets two years ago for a trip to Germany. Since then, we have also taken them to France and other local destinations. They have come through multiple airports with flying colors. They were even lost by Air Berlin for a few days. We have bumped the wheels over cobblestone walkways and uneven surfaces all over Paris and they still work and look brand new. The purple was a smart choice because they are easily spotted on the luggage carousel. The zippers are still strong and so is the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shade

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper...or traveler, I should say
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this luggage at im impressed so far! I think it will work perfectly for our 4 day trip. And I puchased this as a Used product for only around $25 and basically BRAND NEW! , so that makes me happy! There is no bad oders coming from it and its in perfect condition. All the zippers, handels, wheels and retractable pull bar work great! It's even expandable! I like that the wheels are not on casters, it seems like that will give me more space for packing. Definitely got my money's worth!
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set. My daughter needed a suitcase for the various camps she was attending this summer and this fit the bill perfectly! It is a very handsome set. Looks like high quality. It rolls smoothly, the handle expands and retracts with ease and the expandable size allowed great fit for all of her items for a weeks-worth. I love the accompanying bag, as well. When she went to camp, she used the small carrying bag for her toiletries and shower items. When we traveled on the plane the side bag became a book-chrome-book-art-supply carrier. I loved this set so much that I am ordering one for me.
customer_reviews.author: ADB

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to travel by Amtrak train a couple of hundred miles to spend some time with a friend for a couple of days. The bags were not huge but fit my budget and trip perfectly. The rollers were great to pull the suit case around very easily and not put alot of stress on my body as I am a 61 year old handicap woman with a prostethic leg. I do recommend this set and would buy it again if needed. Just can't beat the price and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lightweight Luggage
customer_reviews.text: I love these little suitcase sets. There hold much more than you would expect. The little bag hangs nicely on the handle of the big suitcase when rolling around. It makes our road trips so much easier in loading and unloading. We have 3 sets of these now. They line up nicely on the motel carts standing up since all the same size and have the little bags attached to the handles. Since my husband and I are older, it is much easier handling these bags than big giant heavy suitcases. They are easy on the pocket book also. Certain colors are cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: L.K. Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent suitcases
customer_reviews.text: Good child or carry on size. I bought two for our kids about two years ago and they're holding up very well. They have traveled on long road trips, planes, and on camping trips. No issues with zippers, wheels, or handles. Easy for even my youngest (< 48") to pull. I can fit about 4 days' worth of adult clothes plus shoes and a full week's worth of kids clothes, shoes, and more in them. Colors are true to advertised pictures for green and orange suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: E. Derbin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bag and the value however as many of the other reviews have indicated the telescoping handle broke immediately. The first thing I checked when I pulled the bag out of the box was telescoping handle and when I pulled it up it was not attached on the left side to the bag. It also appeared that the box had been resealed and the bag was scuffed so it appeared to me to have already been sent back to the manufacturer, re-taped and sent back out. I guess with this company it just luck of the draw as to whether you get a new and functioning bag or not.
customer_reviews.author: BTL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Best suitcase period!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, fits in the smallest overhead bins on Delta planes. Only 2-wheels so it does not roll away when you take hands off the handle. Right sized front pockets, bottom for flip flops and top for boarding passes, koozie and other important items. Fits over a weeks worth of clothes. Good quality, I ordered this over 2 years ago and still in like new condition. I'm platinum status with the airline and fly a lot so it has been used countless times and no issues whatsoever. Absolutely recommend for any travel needs!! The price is extremely affordable for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McKee

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well to train travel
customer_reviews.text: I prefer to travel by train, including long distance. That means I need a suitcase that I can haul quickly on and off the train, and also wheel along sometimes for half a mile or so to my hotel. This suitcase has worked very well and is holding up to travel. It's big enough to pack everything I need for a 10-day trip, but still is easy to stash in the train's luggage rack and it's not super heavy. The handle is holding up so far and the wheels roll smoothly. The bright blue color makes it easy to spot my suitcase among all the others.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ullman

customer_reviews.title: 5 Years of Solid Performance
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag for five years over dozens of flights and trips before the wheels finally gave out - which was partially my fault because I dragged it two miles in Copenhagen. I am not going to get this again only because the weight of the suitcase is more than I want, but if that isn't an issue for you, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Poppins

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful set of luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful set of luggage. The largest bag expands to add more room. The color is perfect for me. It's small enough to fit in the overhead bin of an airplane, yet holds enough clothing for a 10 day visit. The smaller bag is perfect for all your personal care products and underwear. I even carried my book, phone, and used it like a handbag. Unfortunately, the front got dirty. I'm not sure how to clean it. The only thing missing to make it perfect is that the rollers only go one direction. Still, I love it. I highly recommend this set for travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Winges

customer_reviews.title: ... still shocked at how cheap this was but how good quality it is
customer_reviews.text: I am still shocked at how cheap this was but how good quality it is! for less than 40 bucks you get a decent sized carry-on suitcase and a small personal bag. The carry-on is expandable so you can totally fit a weeks worth of clothing and toiletries. I didn't notice any tears or fraying on my suit case and the zippers are sturdy and do not come off. It actually comes with a lock as well! The inside of the suitcase is all black and is pretty structured. If you want to take a short vacation and not bring anything back with you this is the perfect luggage.
customer_reviews.author: buffyuna

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I waited till I used this a few times before reviewing. It's a great carry-on. I like to put everything in a carry-on to avoid the carrousel of checked bags after the flight, and this is the perfect size to pack everything for a trip if you're the type who packs light. But some airlines won't let economy class bring a carry-on, and will only allow a personal item/shoulder bag/under-seat luggage. What do you do then? The smaller bag is the perfect size to fit under the seat! Check your individual airline's dimensions, but it should be the right size. Such a great price, you're basically getting the under-seat bag for free!
customer_reviews.author: BAGS

customer_reviews.title: Professional luggage met our needs
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah this is it this is the set my wife just loves. A true carry on and personal bag that looks really cool and is easy to find because of the bright color. It survived a trip to Florida from Wisconsin with a layover in Philadelphia. It also survived having to be put on as a checked bag at the airplane stairs. She found it easy to pack and held her close and personal items well doing all the travel. The personal carry bag held her purse contents and other personal items for the rest of the trip. Recommended buy the two of us
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, but love it!
customer_reviews.text: Suitcase is durable and of good quality. Purchased a green one for the color and love it. The suitcase itself is a bit smaller than I expected, but it was not questioned when used as a carry on (husband's normal sized carry on was questioned and forced to check in) so that workout out to my advantage. It also discouraged me from over-packing which is a bad habit of mine while traveling. Overall I love the bag and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Size not what is seems, very tiny inside, space wasted on external pockets.
customer_reviews.text: The size does not include the useless outside pockets, which make the suitcase too large for many carry on requirements. Further, since the size is taken up with the outside pocket, the internal room is very tiny. I can find no use for this. After returning from the trip I bought it for, but was unable to use, the short return window had closed, so out my money as well.
customer_reviews.author: WIwise

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Suitcase with plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: This suitcase is very sturdy and it fits a lot of clothes. I last used it on a 6 day trip and this is the only suitcase I brought in addition to a backpack. I like that the fabric is thicker than most suitcases and I also like that it stands out with the bright color. Most people have black suitcases, but this one is perfect - you don't have to worry about misplacing it at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great small luggage set!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this product! I was apprehensive about ordering due to the size, but it will be great for a weeks worth of clothing traveling home for the holidays! The extension and pickets add extra room for belongings, plus the carry on bag is a nice size for the basics! I think the color is wonderful, and I would definitely recommend this product based off of my look-over so far!
customer_reviews.author: Stefany Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Excellent carry on set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set for the money. If you want better quality, pay more. I felt that for the price I got two very nice bags. The bigger bag is perfect for a carry on. The outside pockets hold my quart size bag of liquids and my toiletries easily. The wheels and the handle work well. The smaller bag is perfect for snacks and my purse for trips. I don't walk around with a purse, I use my pockets. This helped hold a lot of chargers and extras. The green is a little more olive than the picture but it's still pretty. I will purchase two more sets for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect luggage for once in awhile trips!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a lightweight, weekend carryon. One issue for me, only two wheels = you drag it behind you. It cannot do 360 degree spins like the other “luggage-ballerinas” at the airport! (The two ‘wheels in the back don’t spin.) always read everything, then read it again; I tell myself. Anyway, other than that, it was great. I needed it immediately so away I went. If I use it 5-6 times; it paid for itself. It looks decent and fills a basic need. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if they added zippered pockets on the sides, inside the suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Son Just received it asa gift, has not been put to use yet. So can’t comment on durability at this time. Looking at in person,it is a nice piece of luggage,lightweight. I do wish that the extending handle was a little more sturdy and I feel like the button to release the handle is a little wobbly,could be made a little stronger. It would be good if it had some inside zipper pockets along the sides of the suitcase interior.
customer_reviews.author: K.Valerioti

customer_reviews.title: Cute, just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, nothing to big and not to small, I plan to make this my hospital bag when I give birth. Both me and the baby things can fit in this suitcase. It’s more like a kids suitecase but I will use it as a hospital bag and for travels as well, it’s definitely big enough for my needs & it comes with another little bag inside for personal items (soap, deodorant, etc..). Great buy for me!
customer_reviews.author: BRE

customer_reviews.title: Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: As a first time flyer I figured it'd be a good idea to get a new bag instead of using an old beat up carry-on. I was really surprised about this bag, I was able to pack for a 6 day trip and fit everything. Plus it came with a handy dandy bag that I didn't know about! I used the smaller bag as my personal carry-on and it was able to fit my laptop also. The love the color of the bag as well!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute piece of luggage, ideal for a child since it is smaller than the usual roller-style suitcase, both in width and depth. The wheels are not made for heavy-use, being rather narrow and delicate. We bought the purple, which is lighter than on the website image, ideal for a little girl going to Grandma's a few times a year, but unlikely to withstand airline baggage handling.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive set for casual travelers
customer_reviews.text: 6 day trip to California and I was easily able to take enough clothes for the trip. Meets all the airline carry on specs and I watched several have to check bags that were slightly oversized but this set went right thru. Rolled great survived a spill down a set of stairs with no issues and the underwear bag slid over handle and worked great while running thru terminal to catch next flight. Love the zippered bottom liner dandruff rolled up socks and more along the handle inset.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L waller

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Although the suitcase is nice, the stated case size and the actual measured size are not the same. I bought this to replace an old 21" suitcase which measures 21X14X9. However, this suitcase actually measures 20" (not the states 21") by 13" (not the 13.5") by 8.5" ( the only matching stated size.) It is quite a bit smaller as a result than my previous suitcase which means I can not fit the same amount of clothing/shoes inside for traveling. I have chosen to purchase another true to size case and keep this as a backup for future travel.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: FALLS APART AFTER FIRST FEW HOURS OF YOUR TRIP!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately,this travel set last only few hours before it starts to fall apart... I was lucky I was able to still use it on the way back from my trip to Europe. I guess you get what you pay for. Please see pictures,poor stitching. And I used this smaller back only for documents and few other things to keep them handy on the plane,bag was 1/2 full and very light,yet stitched started to split only after few hours...I’m returning this travel set right now and going to look for something with higher price and hopefully better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage!
customer_reviews.text: This set of carry-ons is perfect. It's exactly as advertised. It is half the price of the exact same set on E-bay, and a quick delivery. Have used many times since purchase and it shows no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: Quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable luggage at this price! Bought this set to travel to Mexico recently for a week. I purchased the green set which was an attractive color made of very sturdy canvas. Zippers worked great and it even had an extra that would expand the luggage space around an inch in width. I was able to pack a weeks worth of warm weather clothing easily and had no problem at the airports using this as a carry-on. I've now used this suitcase for 3 seprate trips in the time I've had it and it's held up perfectly through about 6 airports!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Marie

customer_reviews.title: Your miles may very because I don't bring a lot of unnecessary things with me like my travel mates
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to take on my trip last year. I don't know why but it seemed smaller than expected in person but that didn't matter. I can fit a week worth of clothes in the luggage. Your miles may very because I don't bring a lot of unnecessary things with me like my travel mates. The smaller bag makes a good storage for toiletry items. The handle was sturdy and durable. The wheels performed just as it was intended to. At any point of my trip I did not feel like it would fall apart. For the price point it was a great value. I will be using it again for this year's trip.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: love the color
customer_reviews.text: I really like this suitcase. The color is great and very vibrant, it holds a lot of clothes, and it was a good price. The only bad thing about mine is the handle sticks sometimes, which can be a bit of an annoyance. It does go up half way but sometimes I can't get it to pull all the way up. I do wish the personal bag was a bit bigger but it still holds a decent amount. Other than that it is a good buy, as long as your handle works......
customer_reviews.author: CPatton

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Handle never worked correctly. It only retracted half way. Also the handle it’s pretty flimsy and I was waiting for it to totally break which it never did. The biggest issue was when the luggage was packed it never stood up on its own. It always fell forward. When waiting on a line you would need to lean it on your leg. When giving it to someone to load on a wagon or airport belt you would have to tell them because it would just fall over. Really annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it more stars but the fact Im worried about it breaking is my reason. Perfect size for a carry on. Cool color options. Reading reviews I am worried about the handle breaking during the trip. You definetly need to maneuver it gingerly while pulling the handle out and pushing it back in. We will see if it holds up for the trip. No other visible defects. Comes with 3 year manufacture warranty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The luggage is solidly built and seems to be good quality. The big bag only has wheels on ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this set to take on a flight recently. The luggage is solidly built and seems to be good quality. The big bag only has wheels on one side, and the wheels don't rotate so the bag has to be pulled behind you. This is no big deal, but some people like having the four wheels and the ability to easily push the bag along beside them. The little bag is a little bigger than a standard purse, but it's a great size to put electronics, books. or whatever personal item you want to take on a plane. This is a great set at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: indianaj222

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: That old saying of when you buy cheap, you get cheap... well it stands true for this. I purchased this set for a short business trip. When rolling the luggage to my car to head to the airport, it felt like the wheels were stuck. When I got to the airport and was pulling the luggage, the wheels kept feeling like they had brakes on them and they were dragging. I'm hoping to get a few more uses out of this, but I may end up just buying a much better quality carry-on luggage bag for my next trip. Moral of the story, buy the more expensive, better quality luggage. It'll save you frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have a great trip & find your purple luggage with ease!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy inside. Outside pouches are perfect for things you might want to get to in a hurry ... like your phone, your tickets or your laptop. Very pretty shade of purple. The smaller piece is perfect for the overhead bin. The suitcase is too big for United if you've bought an "economy" ticket but is accepted by other airlines as a carry-on piece. Seems to be sturdy and well made. Had a somewhat unpleasant chemical odor when it first arrived but that disappeared after being open for two days.
customer_reviews.author: Dont_Bug_Me-I'm_Reading

customer_reviews.title: Only good for carry on
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is fine to carry on, I have done that several times with no incident. The first to me I used the larger one that I had to check, it was broken beyond being able to use again. I’m not saying that the airline isn’t ridiculously hard on luggage, but the entire wheel was pushed into the inside of the suitcase and I couldn’t even roll it and had to carry the damn thing. Then I used the mid sized one for a road trip and when I packed to leave the zipper was broken. Again both of the above reviews were on the very first use.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bee

customer_reviews.title: Works for intended use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a work trip. Yes they are not the highest quality luggage out there, but these will fit the parameters for size and as long as you don't go crazy over-packing it too heavy, these are great for travelling. No problem getting through airport security or fitting these on the plane. Loved the bright color, so easy to find once I landed. Would buy more of these !
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Mom

customer_reviews.title: I sent mine back as it was too small.
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism for the handle took up valuable space inside the already small packing space that the US Traveler-Rio offers at the same size. I ordered and received my new brand of luggage to replace the US Traveler. It arrived before I could get the first one sent back. I found by comparison it was much heavier than the new one, and it was more awkward to roll around also. I am glad I went with a Reyleo hard case... and it only cost $10.00 more.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barger

customer_reviews.title: Worst carry on luggage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this carry on luggage for a recent airplane trip. The second bag that is given is tiny. There is not much that you can fit in that bag yet it counts as a second bag at the airport. I would have been better off just utilizing my purse with the main carry on suitcase which by the way is also small. The zippers fell off track and got stuck numerous times making them impractical. It is amazing to me how this particular luggage got such great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Held up to daily use stuffed full to bursting and rough use for over a year before it even started tearing and the handle stopped going in easily. That's about what I'd expect at this price point, and I'm happy with what I got out of it. I feel like some redesign could be used for the wheels. I'm not sure why, but this bobbles about on its wheels sometimes which other luggage has never done for me. This is by no means a deal-breaker though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a larger piece (3 piece) to match this 2 piece. It's great for quick weekend getaways, perfect size for overhead on flights, the smaller under your seat - I bought the green, it's not the bright neon color the picture shows, the color is definitely not what the picture shows, but it's still a nice enough green for me to really like it. I'll definitely be standing out at airports. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kimba

customer_reviews.title: Held up well
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this suitcase held up well. I packed it overflowing! Was very worried it would split open but it didn’t! With only 2 wheels it’s a bit hard to maneuver. Also the handle does seem a bit loose. Wobbly and doesn’t stand up by itself. But it made it to Italy, planes, trains and cobblestone! I’m impressed! Not a true orange color though, more mustard.
customer_reviews.author: Kalh79

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 12 yo son for a 3 day class trip. He wanted a green suitcase so he was happy. It feels like a $35 suitcase so I’m not sure how long it will last but served our needs well for the time being. Easily fit all his clothes and toiletries for 3 days with room to spare for his pillow! It was Carried in the plane and also checked and looks good as new. Good buy for $35.
customer_reviews.author: Lovestoshop

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE AND DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Zipper in liner broke easily. But the rest of it is great for the money. Very light and quite durable. Only used the carry on suitcase. Can only take a carry on and one personal item, like my purse. So in order to not check bags, I crammed it all into the suitcase. Fit in the overhead bin perfectly! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Evans

customer_reviews.title: Nice Luggage
customer_reviews.text: The conveyor belts are very hard on the fabric luggage when checking bags. Particularly since they now insist on placing the flaps side on the belt instead of up towards the air. Anyway, while I normally carry these on, occasionally I have to check them. So far bags have survived the conveyor trip. I originally bought them because I wanted a setup where the second bag sat securely on the one with wheels. This set does that very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E.

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and upgrade, this is meh at best
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly small, like luggage for a very business-like toddler. At least it wasn't pink floral, I guess. Lots of fraying and the zipper broke with it half-empty. Not real luggage at all. The only reason I'm not returning is becaise someone recycled the packaging while I was on the trip I needed luggage for. I recommend springing for an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: It got the job done
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag but I feel the smaller bag is useless. You’ll be better off going with a weekender bag. That smaller bag in this set is tiny in comparison to what you’re allowed by the airlines. I would use that bag for makeup and hairbrushes...if you’re allowed 2 bags get a bigger bag and stuff that one inside.
customer_reviews.author: KAYE

customer_reviews.title: Falls over! Poor design!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty green color but not functional! When I packed it , the suitcase would not stand upright. It fell over forward due to the poor design. Only 2 back wheels and no support in front. I immediately returned it. Glad I realized this a couple days before my trip! It would have made for a very unhandy travel experience. Do not buy this if you will be packing more than 2 outfits in it!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I knew something was wrong immediately when I saw the shipping box. It looks big (maximum carry-on size) but it would fit INSIDE my old carry-on tote. It would be okay I suppose for a child. The wheels didn't spin freely and the plastic around the corners didn't fit tightly giving the product a very cheap feel. Sent it back. It looks much nicer in the pictures than in reality. (I bought two of these, different colors.)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size carry on
customer_reviews.text: Although I already have two carry on bags, this bag has more capacity for its size. I actually unpacked a large check in bag and was able to fit everything into this carry on. It expands and zippers closed so you don't have to worry about it opening. I don't know what all the fuss is about hard shell bags. i have two and they are heavier. This bag is light and holds more items than any other carry on.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great price for solid luggage.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip in June, so we haven't put it to the test yet. That being said, an excellent first impression. Light but solid in design. I could easily fit a week's worth of clothes in it when I gave it a try. It doesn't tip over easily which is a definite plus.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Miller

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Durability was very important to me. The luggage set was very fashionable as well as durable and light weight I plan to order the larger size in the near future for an upcoming trip. I was able to pack for five days with this luggage set and I even had a few outfits that I didn't get a chance to wear. I went on a 4 day cruise so the set worked out perfectly, I was able to pack all my clothing in the suitcase and used the smaller bag for shoes only.
customer_reviews.author: Rparker

customer_reviews.title: Study luggage for any traveler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the blue luggage set. The set is made of 100% 1200d polyester. Easy to clean just wipe with a wet cloth for spot cleaning. Included in set is: (1) 21-inch Upright (1) 21 in. H x 13.5 in. W x 8.5 in. D (Expands to 10.5 in. D); 6.6 lbs (1) Travel Tote: 14 in. W x 10 in. H x 6 in. D; 1.3 lbs. There is a retractable push-button/ self-locking handle system. Positioned with inline skate wheels with corner protectors and top and side carry handles. I also love the Large zippered mesh lid pocket, multiple front pockets. Due to the expandable feature that gives you an extra 25% more packing capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette McD

customer_reviews.title: Functional and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time. Love the light weight. It holds more than it looks like it will and the expansion is nice. The handle works well and is long enough. Inside straps and lid mesh are handy. This is a good suitcase for the money. I used to travel weekly for work, and I don’t think it would hold up well for the brutal weekly airline abuse but for the occasional traveler it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: F. E.

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly if unbalanced, but value is alright
customer_reviews.text: I'd pack your heaviest things toward the bottom rear where the wheels are because the wheeled bag easily wobbles side to side or flips around if it loses balance and was quite frustrating. The wheels should be further apart to be honest. Otherwise, the expandable piece is great and does add quite a bit of room. Went to Europe for two weeks with just this and my own laptop bag and it was more than sufficient (provided you find a laundry facility each week). Price got me what I expected, and I've learned how to pack it since.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Faricy

customer_reviews.title: Purplelicious Traveler Rio Luggage set!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my upcoming Caribbean trip of 5 days. Its sturdy and fits all airlines carry-on luggage requirements. Haven’t used it yet, so can’t speak to the durability for now (will update post after a few trips), but the material is sturdy. The telescopic handle isn’t as solid as expected but, wheels move smoothly. I’m very pleased with this set. Prime 2 days delivery...we ❤️!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Carry-On Size
customer_reviews.text: I usually fly Domestic with Delta and this suitcase is the perfect carry on size. This is my third purchase. I got one a while ago for myself, but recently bought two more for an upcoming trip. Each family member has one now. When flying i only use the suitcase, but the bag that comes with it is also a great size!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Ok but cheap
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for my stuff and small enough for carry on. But the handle keeps sticking halfway up or down in the first use. So it’s only a matter of time before it breaks. EDIT: I’ve used them a second time now and the handle still keeps sticking but it made it through a week vacation. Will be flying again later this year. If it makes it thought that one it will have totally been worth the $30 for three uses.
customer_reviews.author: S. Way

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a cruise trying to stay within crappy airline limits. Not an issue with cruise line. Very durable, worked fine. Used on a Greyhound Bus with leaky luggage compartment. No leaks into the baggage. Nice compartments. Easy to manipulate from any angle. Reasonably price. Small bag is a nice, useful addition. Like color selection - easy to find among a ton of identical black bags.
customer_reviews.author: gwh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as carry ons
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a trip to use as carry one. Worked great, I liked the expansion option. The smaller carry on fastens easily to the case making it a breeze to maneuver through the airport. Can’t say much for the durability as I only used it once but the price was right and it served its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn67

customer_reviews.title: Three Years and Still Going Strong!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this bag for exactly three years now and am absolutely amazed. For less than $40, this roller bag has taken numerous trips and visited several countries, including a 3-week jaunt around Ireland. It is the perfect size for any airline's carry-on baggage requirements and holds quite a bit more than you might think. Everything--the zippers, rollers, etc.--still work exactly as they did on the day I first purchased the bag. And it still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Ultrarunner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I love this luggage set. I bought it o replace a similar one that was only 1 inch taller and didn't seem to hold nearly as much as this one does. The smaller bag is perfect for packing personal care items and anything smaller such as medications. I recently used both of these bags for a month long visit for eye surgery and the two combined allowed me to pack enough clothing, my personal hygiene goods, and even my medications with ease. They are also extremely light weight and well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Andrews

customer_reviews.title: It will get the job done for light travel.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered blue. Color is much darker than advertised in picture. Looks nicer in the picture too. Also expected nicer, more durable feeling material & zippers for the price. I also dont like how it opens from the left instead of the right. Every suitcase I've ever owned has opened from the right so its just weird for me. It will get the job done though. I personally wouldnt use this for any extended travels. But i only ordered it for when i go into labor to use as my hospital bag. So for me, it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: 2 pc. luggage
customer_reviews.text: This luggage did everything I needed it to do and more. Went to Israel in September and it was perfect. Since I stayed with friends it was big enough and held 5 days worth of clothes and other things very nicely. I had laundry facilities with my friends so I didn't need to take too much clothes for a 3 week stay. When I got home it still looks good, not torn or ripped, clean, perfect, it made the trip very well. I put all my clothes in the suitcase to come home and used the tote for all my purchases while there. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Shirah

customer_reviews.title: I picked this because I loved the color- made it very easy to identify as ...
customer_reviews.text: I picked this because I loved the color- made it very easy to identify as mine. The material is thick and the seams are put together securely. Zippers work fine and soft handles are fastened well. The issue I had with it is that the retractable slide broke at the handle, disconnecting it. I was able to reattach it using a pin to secure it so I now had a handle but now I cannot get it to expand. I only used this on one 10 day trip and it happened on the 9th day.
customer_reviews.author: Peace13

customer_reviews.title: Useful, handy, attractive bags perfect for short term travel
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, handy, attractive -- exactly as presented and what I needed, for carry-on or for shorter travel such as two or three nights (which I used it for during recent driving trip and found it perfect.) Easy to carry/move with the wheels and convenient to pack. Like the color. The toiletry bag is useful. Handy, large side pockets. Seems relatively sturdy, not too flimsy as many bags are now.
customer_reviews.author: Avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Set of Luggage
customer_reviews.text: We Bought these to use for a trip to Aruba so we don’t have to check in bags. I was surprised by how well they held up, and for this price I don’t think you can go wrong. They are really useful and we don’t seem to have the kiddies others were having so wife and I were pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: There is no flat piece on the bottom of this suitcase-- Your clothes lay against the metal bar
customer_reviews.text: What type of crazy piece of luggage is this? Great size but no flat bottom of the suitcase? This means that your clothes fold around the back metal bar. I have never seen a piece of luggage like this before. And, god forbid, the back should tear-- there is no protection for losing your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of luggage.
customer_reviews.text: I love this piece of luggage. I bought it used but I sure couldn't tell. I had a weekend trip that I was in and out of several different places in a matter of just a few days. The luggage was so handy because all you do is lift the handle and take off. Thank you for a wonderful piece of luggage.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very small suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than average carry-on suitcase. Unable to use. But I did like the personal item size luggage that came with it. It was spacious, yet fit nicely under the seat on flight.
customer_reviews.author: Freebird0.5

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once, flying from Wv to Minnesota and it was easy to get around and the tote bag is a good size, I could get all my liquids and other Items in it with no problem. the roller is quite large as well. thinking about getting an additional one for my husband as for durability,y like I said, I have only used it once but it looks new still.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pieces of luggage. Great for short trips or for items you want to pack separately. Ended up getting another piece for myself. (first one was for my husband) old be great for grandchildren going to grandparents for the weekend with their favorite items also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazdnu

customer_reviews.title: Durable, easy to handle, spacious, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love the carry on luggage. I use this luggage on every domestic flight I make which is almost once in every three months. The size is perfect according to any domestic flight carry on luggage dimension. The inside is also very spacious. The hanle and the wheels are very sturdy. The handle moves very smoothly. I didn't face any issue while using for the last one and half year. It comes with a set of tiny little cute lock amd key.
customer_reviews.author: Nahid Sultan Al-Mamun

product_meta.title: U.S. Traveler Rio Rugged Fabric Expandable Carry-On Luggage Set, Green, 2-Piece
product_meta.description: Size:One Size| Color:GreenGo anywhere with the traveler's choice U.S. Traveler Rio two piece expandable carry-on luggage se. This luggage set is made of luxurious superior 1200d rigid polyester construction. It features an interior deluxe retractable push-button/ self-locking handle system and inline skate wheels with corner protectors. It has all the space you need to pack your travel essentials including multiple front pockets and a large zippered mesh lid pocket. Need more room? The expandable feature provides 25% more packing capacity. Plus, it features full interior lining and dual adjustable tie down straps to secure your belongings. The solid metal hardware protects your things and the EVA padded front panel is designed to provide extra durability. Plus, the top and side carry handles make lifting luggage easy. Dimensions: 21-inch upright: 21 in. H x 13.5 In. W x 7.5 In. D (expands to 9 In. D); 6.6 lbs; travel tote: 14 in. W x 10 in. H x 6 in. D; 1.3 Lbs.
feature_bullets: Internal deluxe retractable push-button, Self-locking handle system for easy maneuvering
Piggy-bag-strap for easy-carrying the tote bag together
Elegant fully lined interior with tie-down straps and large interior meshed zipper pocket
Expandable feature that offers more packing capacity
Inline skate wheels, reinforced wheel housing
Adjustable and detachable non-slip padded shoulder strap on tote
Dimensions : Tote Bag measures 14"W x 10"H x 6"D and the rolling bag measures 21"H x 13.5"W x 7.5"D

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,799 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
